preqs: MGB1010, MGC1010, MGG1010, MGF1010, MGP1010 or MGW1010

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 21, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB1010, MGC1010, MGF1010, MGG1010, MGP1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MGC2430, MGF2661%, MGM2661, MGW2430, MGX2661}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGB2430, MGC2430, MGG2430, MGW2430}
Unit was previously coded {MGC2430, MGF2661%, MGM2661, MGW2430, MGX2661}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGB2430, MGC2430, MGG2430, MGW2430}

description: This unit is an introduction to human resource management, theory, context and practices. It focuses on the contribution of HRM to organisational competitive advantage and meeting the needs of employees and other stakeholders.
